result.title: Atmos Energy Increases Quarterly Dividend
result.text: DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Atmos Energy Corporation (NYSE: ATO) said today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend increase on the company's common stock to $1.00 per share. The Fiscal 2025 annual dividend was $3.48. The Fiscal 2026 indicated annual dividend is $4.00. The dividend will be paid on December 8, 2025, to shareholders of record on November 24, 2025. result.title: Atmos Energy: Favorable Legislation, Stability Make Shares Attractive (Upgrade)
result.text: Atmos Energy benefits from a favorable Texas regulatory environment, driving predictable cash flows and supporting robust capital investment programs. Atmos Energy's earnings are 100% regulated, with 86% of cap-ex focused on safety and reliability, and a strong balance sheet with well-managed debt maturities. Recent Texas legislation and customer growth have boosted revenue and earnings, prompting an increase in EPS guidance to $7.35-$7.45 for the year.

result.title: Atmos Energy Corporation to Host Fiscal 2025 Year End Earnings Conference Call on November 6, 2025
result.text: DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Atmos Energy Corporation (NYSE: ATO) will host a conference call on Thursday, November 6, 2025, at 10 a.m. Eastern to review the company's Fiscal 2025 financial results, establish guidance for Fiscal 2026, and refresh the company's five-year plan through Fiscal 2030. Atmos Energy will release these results on Wednesday, November 5, 2025, following the market close.
